subject: Re: Bertrand Meyer's approach (Contract-Driven Development)
msgSnippet: Ok, lets say I like DbC. What tools should I use in Java? I use Eclipse. Will my refactorings be propagated to those tools? What if I have lots of assertions
messageBody:
Ok, lets say I like DbC. What tools should I use in Java? I use Eclipse.
Will my refactorings be propagated to those tools?
What if I have lots of assertions and invariants, how do I organize them?
Tool support is often an important issue in adoption of new technologies.

Regards,
David

From: "haefeleuser" <haefeleuser@...>

Subject: Bertrand Meyer's approach (Contract-Driven Development)
